Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Great Dictator
programme.desc: After suffering from memory loss, a soldier returns to his former profession as a barber and attempts to escape persecution by the military forces.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore believe that Dave is going to propose to his girlfriend, Samantha, in Miami. In a bid to retain their place in Dave's life, the three set out to stop him.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: When his new neighbour's extravagant Christmas decorations appear, a man feels challenged and initiates a spirited decorating competition.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Eight very different couples and their love lives intertwine during a hectic month before Christmas in London.

programme.title: Yours, Mine & Ours
programme.desc: Frank, a widower with eight children decides to marry his ex-girlfriend Helen, a widow with ten children. However, their eighteen children turn their marriage into complete chaos.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: A man discovers that the woman he is dating is a superhero and decides to break up with her. However, things do not go as he planned when she uses her powers to turn his life into a nightmare.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: An archeology expert joins an Indian professor to look for a lost treasure of India. However, things take a dangerous turn when they are ambushed in their quest.

programme.title: Guess Who
programme.desc: Percy Jones, a proud African American man, gets the shock of his life when he learns that his daughter Theresa's fiance is a Caucasian man.

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: When a middle-aged advertising executive is gifted with the power to read women's minds, he uses it to outwit his new boss.

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: After FBI agent Malcolm Turner's stepson, Trent, witnesses a murder, the two are forced to go undercover. While Malcolm turns into Big Momma, Trent disguises himself as Charmaine.

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: With her career crashing and her boyfriend dumping her, Ally tries to contact her former partners in the desperate hope of finding true love.

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: With her career crashing and her boyfriend dumping her, Ally tries to contact her former partners in the desperate hope of finding true love.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

programme.title: Mune

programme.desc: The key aspects of filmmaking are explored, with behind-the-scenes insights and intriguing interviews with prominent cast and crew members.

Now, as the police attempt to silence the woman before she can testify about the city's rampant corruption, the ex-con who just regained his freedom must defend her life, and clear his own name.

programme.title: 3 Days To Kill
programme.desc: A dangerous international spy is determined to give up his high stakes life to finally build a closer relationship with his estranged wife and daughter. But first, he must complete one last mission - even if it means juggling the two toughest assignments yet: hunting down the world's most ruthless terrorist and looking after his teenage daughter for the first time in ten years, while his wife is out of town.

programme.title: Stars!
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: An ex- CIA operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect.

programme.title: Absolute Deception
programme.desc: A widowed reporter recruits the help of a federal agent to investigate her late husband's secrets, but the two become the target of unknown attackers. When FBI Agent John Nelson’s key informant, Miles, is abducted and shot, all that’s left is a severed finger. In order to find a new lead, Nelson travels to New York City to inform widowed magazine reporter Rebecca Scott that her long dead husband, Miles, had only recently been murdered to see if she had heard from him in recent years. Perplexed,.

programme.title: Wild For The Night
programme.desc: A loner fresh out of rehab and hunted by both sides of the law returns home to solve the murder of his sister, and finds himself entangled in a game of revenge on the LA club circuit.

programme.title: The Kidnapping of Freddy Heineken
programme.desc: The true story of the kidnapping of Freddy Heineken, the grandson of the founder of the Heineken brewery, and his driver. They were released after a ransom of 35 million Dutch guilders was paid.

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: A young mother and her twin sons move into a rural house that's marked for death.

programme.title: Final Score
programme.desc: When a stadium is seized by a group of heavily armed criminals during a major sporting event, an ex-soldier must use all his military skills to save both the daughter of a fallen comrade and the huge crowd unaware of the danger.

programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In a violent, near-apocalyptic Detroit, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products wins a contract from the city government to privatize the police force. To test their crime-eradicating cyborgs, the company leads street cop Alex Murphy into an armed confrontation with crime lord Boddicker so they can use his body to support their untested RoboCop prototype. But when RoboCop learns of the company's nefarious plans, he turns on his masters.

programme.title: Superfast!
programme.desc: Undercover cop Lucas White joins Vin Serento's gang of illegal street racers. They are fast and they are furious and they plan to double cross Los Angeles kingpin Juan Carlos de la Sol, who hides his cash in a downtown Taco Bell.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: Bill Marks is a burned-out veteran of the Air Marshals service. He views the assignment not as a life-saving duty, but as a desk job in the sky. However, today's flight will be no routine trip. Shortly into the transatlantic journey from New York to London, he receives a series of mysterious text messages ordering him to have the government transfer $150 million into a secret account, or a passenger will die every 20 minutes.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 2
programme.desc: With the nation of Panem in a full scale war, Katniss confronts President Snow in the final showdown. Teamed with a group of her closest friends – including Gale, Finnick, and Peeta – Katniss goes off on a mission with the unit from District 13 as they risk their lives to stage an assassination attempt on President Snow who has become increasingly obsessed with destroying her. The mortal traps, enemies, and moral choices that await Katniss will challenge her more than any arena she faced in The.

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Billy "The Great" Hope, the reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, has an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter, and a lavish lifestyle. However, when tragedy strikes, Billy hits rock bottom, losing his family, his house and his manager. He soon finds an unlikely savior in Tick Willis, a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, Hope fights to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most.

programme.title: EXPEND4BLES
programme.desc: The Expendables - original and new - are on a mission, this time to Qadhafi's old chemical weapons plant in Libya to intercept Suharato Rahmat, on his own solo operation to steal nuclear missile detonators for his wicked client, Ocelot.

programme.title: PARANORMAL ACTIVITY: THE MARKED ONES
